overview: With a budget of five-thousand dollars Carl & Major have to make a movie by the end of the summer. Guided only by Carl's blind ambition they are determined to make the next summer block buster! If only they could decide what to name it... A fast paced, guerrilla style film about the delicate time between adolescence and adulthood. These kids have no idea where they're going; only that it's forward.
title: Working Title
